articles.title: Morning Briefing: Top stories from The Straits Times on June 3, 2025
articles.summary: FairPrice is trialing smart trolleys. This trial aims to create stores of tomorrow through a digital push.

articles.title: Red Bull hosts fitness challenge to celebrate Red Bull Zero launch
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Red Bull is launching Red Bull Zero, a new zero-sugar energy drink featuring monk fruit extract and other sweeteners, available in 250ml matte light-blue cans. To support the launch, Red Bull is also introducing the 'Red Bull Zero Excuses Challenge', a 30-day fitness challenge, starting June 1, featuring Red Bull athletes and prizes.

articles.title: BookCraft Publishers Unveils Comprehensive Self-Publishing Services Empowering Authors with Full Creative Control and Global Reach
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A leading innovator in the self-publishing industry launched an expanded suite of author services. These services aim to streamline the self-publishing journey from manuscript development.

articles.title: 36 Things From Amazon's 'Most Wished For' List You Won't Regret Buying Because They're Actually So Useful
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Amazon's "Most Wished For" section features several new products like the Owala Freesip water bottle with a built-in straw, the OPI RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish for fast manicures, and the Ninja Creami for creating desserts at home. Other featured items include the Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil, Angry Orange citrus deodorizer and Bissell Little Green machine.

articles.title: Celebrate 11 years of .xyz with Domains.co.za
articles.summary: Domains.co.za is offering new .xyz domain registrations for R18.99 during June 2025 as part of a promotional campaign. The .xyz domain extension, launched by ICANN in 2014, is presented as a modern and versatile option suitable for various brands and ventures.

articles.title: Genesis GV60 Magma spied: Heated up electric SUV takes shape
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Genesis is launching its new Magma performance sub-brand. The first vehicle to be released under this sub-brand will be a performance-enhanced version of the GV60 small electric SUV.

articles.title: Microsoft will finally stop bugging Windows users about Edge — but only in Europe
articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.summary: Microsoft is rolling out new features for Windows users in the European Economic Area, including the option to uninstall the Microsoft Store and avoid prompts to set Microsoft Edge as the default browser. Setting a different browser as default will pin it to the taskbar, and the change will apply to more file types. Microsoft Bing and Widgets Board will also open web content with the default browser.

articles.title: My favorite color e-reader is discounted on Amazon right now
articles.author: Allison Murray
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft, featuring a color display, customizable color settings, and fast performance. The device also offers a 150 ppi display for color images and 120 nits of brightness. It is being marketed as offering 'color without compromise'.

articles.title: Survival Game Duckside Coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: Publisher tinyBuild will launch Duckside, a persistent world multiplayer open-world survival game, in Early Access for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S this August. The game, already available on PC via Steam in Early Access, features player-versus-player, player-versus-environment, crafting, and base building elements, with players controlling combat-trained ducks.

articles.title: Crumbl Celebrates Summer With Friends & Family Day
articles.summary: Crumbl launched their Mini Desserts earlier in June 2025. To promote this launch, Crumbl is offering a 'Family & Friends Day' promotion on June 3rd, where customers who purchase a Mini 12-Pack will receive 6 extra Mini Desserts. The entire Crumbl menu is available in mini size, aiming to create new traditions with the new Mini menu.

articles.title: PGD Eco Solutions, Inc. Announces Name Change to Intelithrive, Inc. and Launches New Website to Reflect Strategic Business Pivot  Jun. 2, 2025 21:45
articles.summary: PGD Eco Solutions Inc. has rebranded to Intelithrive Inc. and launched a new website (www.intelithrive.com). This reflects a strategic pivot towards becoming a next-generation incubator focused on artificial intelligence (AI), software-as-a-service (SaaS), and digital innovation. The company aims to launch, acquire, and nurture AI-powered startups in sectors like fintech and decentralized technologies.

articles.title: Nike turns to unexpected brand in desperate bid to win back Gen Z
articles.author: Cody Kline
articles.summary: Nike has launched a new concept called "On Rotation" in select Urban Outfitters locations. The concept is designed as a lounge-like space featuring curated product drops of Nike apparel and footwear, both in-store and online, aiming to recapture Gen Z's attention. This launch is part of Nike's effort to reconnect with younger consumers and regain cultural relevance.

articles.title: SaniSupreme Introduces Functional Elegance with Handdoekrekken, Douchecabines, and More
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SaniSupreme, a Dutch sanitary brand, is introducing new modern bathroom designs. These designs focus on convenience, space efficiency, and contemporary style.

articles.title: Microsoft imposes new rules on Windows 11 laptop makers to ensure they don't cut corners with key features of USB-C ports
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Microsoft is implementing new rules for USB-C ports on Windows 11 laptops to standardize functionality. The goal is to ensure all USB-C ports provide consistent data transfer, power delivery, and external monitor support, addressing inconsistencies present in current implementations where manufacturers could omit certain features.

articles.title: Solar-powered kiosks light the way for Malaysian street vendors
articles.summary: The Malaysian government launched the MyKiosk project in 2023, investing MYR150 million to provide street hawkers with new, standardized kiosks.  MyKiosk aims to offer small traders the chance to run their businesses legally in hygienic environments.  MyKiosk 2.0 launched in December 2024.

articles.title: Love in the spin cycle: How to turn laundry time into quality time
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: LG promotes its WashTower™ and WashCombo™ laundry appliances. The LG WashTower™ is a space-saving washer and dryer with built-in AI, and the LG WashCombo™ is an all-in-one washer-dryer that completes a full load in under two hours.

articles.title: Rock out without tuning out with these TREBLAB earbuds — 59% off
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: TREBLAB launched the X-Open earbuds, featuring open-ear design, 14.2mm drivers, noise cancellation, and IPX5 water resistance. The earbuds connect via Bluetooth 5.4, support Siri and Google Assistant, and offer up to 10 hours of playtime on their own and 30 hours with the charging case.

articles.title: SAMBAZON® Launches New Pre-Topped, No-Sugar-Added Açaí & Smoothie Bowls for Ultimate Convenience
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SAMBAZON has launched a new line of pre-topped frozen açaí & smoothie bowls called 'Fruit & Granola Topped Smoothie & Açaí Bowls'. The new line comes in three flavors: Açaí Berry Blend, Açaí Raspberry Blend, and Mango Dragon Fruit Blend. The bowls are currently available at Target, with plans to expand to Sprouts and Publix.

articles.title: WACKER's BELSIL® Prototypes Take the Spotlight at NYSCC 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: New York Society of Cosmetic Chemists
articles.summary: Wacker Chemical Corporation will showcase its BELSIL® premium-grade silicones at NYSCC Suppliers' Day 2025, including innovative prototypes for skin care, hair care, and color cosmetics. Notable products highlighted are BELSIL® CDM 3526 VP and BELSIL® REG 1103 B, alongside a live hair demonstration for BELSIL® P1101.

articles.title: Braze Completes Acquisition of OfferFit
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Braze has integrated with Quake to empower brands to deliver more engaging experiences. This integration focuses on leveraging AI to improve customer engagement. Quake's AI-driven insights helps Braze's customers to create relevant personalized customer communications.

articles.title: Sheetz debuts two, summer peach ring vodka sodas
articles.author: Media News Group
articles.summary: Sheetz will make available two new beverages in its stores across Pennsylvania starting June 3, 2025.

articles.title: Microsoft sees future of the internet as AI agents crawling websites for us, tech willing
articles.author: Tribune News Service
articles.summary: Microsoft envisions a new version of the internet powered by AI agents, moving beyond current chatbot technology like ChatGPT. The company plans to create an 'open agentic web' where users send AI-powered agents to perform tasks, representing a significant shift from how consumers currently interact with AI.

articles.title: This Iconic Soda Is Headed for the Freezer—and Fans Say They Need It
articles.author: Mary-Linh Tran
articles.summary: Dad's Old Fashioned Root Beer is launching a new ice cream flavor called Dad's Root Beer Float Ice Cream. The ice cream features vanilla ice cream swirled with root beer sherbet and is flavored with Dad's signature soda, known for its spicy notes of wintergreen, licorice, and vanilla. It is available wherever Farr Better Ice Cream is sold, including Walmart and Kroger.

articles.title: Save up to $300 on the Roborock Qrevo S on Amazon, now under $500
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Roborock has launched the Qrevo S Robot Vacuum and Mop, a futuristic cleaner designed to save time and effort. The Qrevo S features an advanced docking station with automatic mop washing, hot air drying, self-emptying, and auto-refilling, and is currently on sale for under $500.

articles.title: Goose Creek Launches Whimsical Candle Collaboration With SpongeBob SquarePants
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Goose Creek, in collaboration with Nickelodeon, launched six new 3-Wick Candles inspired by SpongeBob SquarePants. The SpongeBob SquarePants x Goose Creek collection aims to bring the charm and characters of Bikini Bottom to life through fragrances, and is available exclusively at GooseCreekCandle.com.

articles.title: Simba is giving shoppers who buy a new mattresss £646 of free bedding
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Simba is offering up to £646 worth of free bedding with the purchase of select new mattresses until June 5, 2025. The free bedding package, including Hybrid pillows, a mattress protector, and the Hybrid duvet, is available with the Simba Luxe and Simba Ultra mattresses, while other mattresses like the Essential and Hybrid Pro also come with free pillows and mattress protectors. Simba also provides a 200-night sleep trial, a 10-year warranty, and free shipping with mattress purchases.

articles.title: 38 Affordable Products With Results That'll Make You Do A Triple Take
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Mielle introduces coil sculpting custard with pomegranate extract, coconut oil, and babassu oil for defined curls. Gold Bond launches firming neck and chest cream containing salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. Cosrx releases repairing essence with 96% snail secretion filtrate to provide a glass skin glow.

articles.title: The Real Value of Photorealistic Rendering vs. AI-Generated Images
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: RENDEREXPO specializes in providing detail-rich photorealistic renderings, including Aerial and Interior Rendering, for design and real estate projects. These renderings offer accuracy in representing designs, finishes, and spatial relationships, making them a reliable choice for real estate agents and clients seeking buildable representations of projects. RENDEREXPO positions its renderings as a superior alternative to AI-generated images which can lack the contextual foundation and accuracy required for real-world applications.

articles.title: Switch 2 pre-orders are getting cancelled days before launch
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 on June 5. Customers who pre-ordered the product anticipate updates on processing and shipping status.

articles.title: International grocery store brings relief to Baltimore neighborhood in food desert
articles.author: Mary
articles.summary: LA Mart opened a new grocery store at 4624 Edmondson Avenue in Maryland, filling a food desert left by a Giant Food closure. The store offers a wide selection of produce, international products, a bakery, and a seafood department.

articles.title: Web Hosting In Nigeria
articles.author: Daniel Aiyegbusi
articles.summary: Hostinger offers a range of web hosting services from shared hosting to advanced website building. Their standout feature is the AI-powered Website Builder, which streamlines the design process, allowing creation of fully functional e-commerce stores quickly. Hostinger's pricing delivers value, and the platform supports various content management systems and payment processors.

articles.title: AI Boom Exposes Power Crisis in Data Centers: ScaleFlux Offers a Smarter Way to Scale
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ScaleFlux has introduced its FX5016 NVMe SSD controller and CSD5000 series SSDs. The CSD5000 offers up to 256TB storage, high-speed performance, and energy efficiency. The FX5016 controller powers the CSD5000 series and is designed for PCIe Gen 5.0 to improve SSD performance, capacity, and endurance.

articles.title: Wonder to open 50th dining hall with summer pop-up (photos)
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Wonder is launching its 50th dining hall location in Brick, New Jersey on June 5th. The new location will offer over 20 menus from various acclaimed chefs and eateries, including Alanza Pizza, Bobby Flay Steak, and more. The company aims to reach 90 locations by the end of 2025 and plans to launch sites in Woodbridge, Shrewsbury, Toms River, Mount Laurel, and Jersey City this summer.

articles.title: Review: Canadian brand Cozey launches modular sofa bed
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Cozey, a Montreal-based company known for its modular sofas, has launched the Neptune Sofa-Bed. Unlike traditional sofa beds, the Neptune features a unique and smoother conversion mechanism from sofa to bed. Its modular design allows for customized configurations to fit various spaces.

articles.title: Review: Canadian brand Cozey launches modular sofa bed
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Cozey launched the Neptune Sofa-Bed collection, a modular sofa bed designed to fit smaller spaces. The Neptune is available in various configurations and colors, with an optional sleep kit add-on, and is priced at $2,205 for a two-seater with two ottomans. Cozey delivers the Neptune in boxes for easy assembly.

articles.title: Dyson boosts Saudi presence with new Riyadh store
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new store in Riyadh Park, Saudi Arabia, showcasing its latest technologies. The store highlights several new products, including the Dyson Supersonic r hairdryer, Dyson Airwrap i.d. multi-styler, Supersonic Nural hair dryer, Airstrait wet-to-dry straightener, 360 Vis Nav robot vacuum, Big+Quiet Purifier, and Dyson OnTrac headphones, and offers personal styling sessions as a service.

articles.title: 30 Products You'll Feel Like You're The First To Discover
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Hal's New York launched Vanilla Cream Seltzer Water. It is aimed at cream soda lovers who want a hydrating, sugary-scratch-itch-quenching beverage.

articles.title: PR.Digital Launches as Premier Digital PR Agency Delivering High-Profile Media Coverage for Founders, Startups & Enterprise Brands
articles.author: Seattle
articles.summary: PR.Digital, a new digital PR agency, has launched, offering services like AI-powered targeting and SEO-optimized strategies to help companies secure earned media coverage. The agency focuses on driving business outcomes like organic visibility, SEO authority, and lead generation for its clients.

articles.title: Amazon has this solar-powered bug zapper on sale for its cheapest price ever with 40% off
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: PALONE Bug Zapper is being offered at a mega deal on Amazon.

articles.title: 14 of the best handheld vacuums for an easy life
articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews various new handheld vacuum cleaners from brands like Dyson, Beldray, Vax, Shark, and Miele, highlighting their features such as suction power, battery life, included tools, and suitability for different cleaning tasks. Specific models like the Dyson Car+Boat, Beldray Airlite, and Vax HomePro Pet-Design are examined for their design and performance in areas like car interiors, pet hair removal, and upholstery cleaning.

articles.title: This 7000Pa Vacuum and Mop Roborock Hits a New All-Time Low, Amazon Drops the Price 3 Times in Just One Month
articles.author: Gizmodo Deals
articles.summary: Roborock has launched the Roborock Qrevo S, a powerful robot vacuum with a high-tech docking station. Initially priced at $799, the product is now available for $459.98 on Amazon, marking a significant price reduction.

articles.title: ShowerUp announces second laundry location in Huntsville
articles.author: Jaylan Wright
articles.summary: ShowerUp has launched a second mobile laundry unit location in Huntsville, Alabama, at 2710 Holmes Avenue NW. The mobile laundry unit will provide laundry services every Tuesday from 3 p.m. until 7 p.m. for families, neighbors, and participants of Second Mile Programs and Preschool.

articles.title: Toyota Kirloskar Motor Launches Fortuner and Legender Neo Drive 48V Variants
articles.summary: Toyota Kirloskar Motor (TKM) has introduced new Neo Drive variants for the Fortuner and Legender, equipped with a 48-Volt system. These variants offer improved fuel efficiency, enhanced driving performance, and greater comfort with a hybrid assist that delivers smoother low-end acceleration. Bookings opened on June 02, 2025, with deliveries starting in the 3rd week of June.

articles.title: MEET THE MAKERS: PEI man's desire for unique beard products launches side business
articles.author: Laura Churchill Duke
articles.summary: Justin Doran's company, Valley Boys Beard, launched a line of beard products including balms and oils. The most popular products are MANEtain Bourbon Vanilla Beard balm, Birdseye Maple Beard oil, and Travelin' Cowboy Beard oil. The company aims to provide quality ingredients at affordable pricing.

articles.title: The 'flawless' fake tan 'so popular' one sells every 20 seconds
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Coco and Eve's Honey Bali Bronzing Foam, a popular self-tanner, sells a bottle every 20 seconds. St. Tropez Self Tan Express Mousse is Amazon's number one fake tan choice, promising a week-long wear. Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam has a stellar reputation on Look Fantastic and is currently discounted.

articles.title: Unlocking foodpanda's most delicious deals
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: foodpanda Philippines launched discount codes PANDA100 and PANDA200. The discount codes are part of foodpanda's ongoing Tastes Like A Good Deal campaign, which celebrates the satisfaction of discovering value in every order.

articles.title: Status Update: Dressin, a Chinese fashion brand, opening first US store in Fullerton
articles.author: Samantha Gowen
articles.summary: Dressin, owned by Sailvan Times, is opening its first physical store in Fullerton. Voluspa is opening its second store at Brea Mall. Sweetgreen is opening its fifth location in Orange County in Laguna Niguel. SEV Laser recently opened its newest salon in Yorba Linda.

articles.title: Nostalgic breakfast treats move to the ice cream aisle
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: Kellanova, the snack food division of the Kellogg Company, announced a new line of frozen Pop-Tarts treats, including ice cream sandwiches and ice cream pints, in flavors like Frosted Strawberry, Brown Sugar Cinnamon, and S'mores. Walmart is on the initial retailer list for these new treats.

articles.title: The Discover Samsung sale has up to $1,000 off Bespoke appliances, TVs, smartwatches
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Samsung is hosting its Discover Samsung Summer sales event from June 2 to June 8, offering discounts on various products. Deals include savings on the 75-inch Class QLED 4K TV, Galaxy Watch7, Galaxy Buds3, Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra, Galaxy Book5 Pro, Bespoke refrigerator, and Top Load Washer and Dryer Set.

articles.title: The Discover Samsung sale has up to $1,000 off Bespoke appliances, TVs, smartwatches
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Samsung is offering discounts across its entire product line, including Samsung Galaxy smartphones, Frame TVs, Bespoke home appliances, computing devices, smartwatches with health monitoring, waterproof earbuds, dust and waterproof tablets, Intel Core Ultra 7 Processor laptops, refrigerators with changeable door panels and internal dispensers, and laundry sets with Vibration Reduction Technology+.

articles.title: This Popular Cordless Dyson Vacuum Is $170 Off Right Now But Not For Too Long
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 cordless vacuum, known for its strong suction and lightweight design, is currently on sale at Walmart with up to 36% off, a total of $170 savings. The V8 features whole-machine filtration, an easy-empty design, and transforms into a handheld vacuum with multiple cleaning attachments.

articles.title: Make-up icon François Nars shares his beauty secrets
articles.author: Rose Beer
articles.summary: A company created Orgasm Blush. The company chose the name to evoke emotion and a feeling related to the product.

articles.title: bolttech powers Generative AI-driven hyper-personalized customer services on AWS  Jun. 2, 2025 15:23
articles.summary: bolttech has launched "bolttech Gen AI Factory", a generative AI platform built on Amazon Bedrock. This platform enhances customer service through real-time personalized responses and automates tasks like claims processing. It also introduces AI-driven capabilities for personalized insurance products, risk assessment, and claims processing to improve prediction, prevention, and recovery in its customer product offerings.

articles.title: ALDI Grocery Carts Ready to Roll on H Street, NE! Grand Opening this Thursday!
articles.author: Prince
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new grocery store in Washington, DC on June 5th, 2025. The store will offer a variety of products including fresh produce and everyday essentials. Aldi is inviting customers to visit the new location at 801 H St NE.

articles.title: Identity of Newcastle's 'mystery' new restaurant confirmed as popular chain expands
articles.author: Simon Duke
articles.summary: Fries & Burgz is opening a new restaurant in Newcastle city center on Percy Street. The new location, referred to as 'Shop No. 5,' will offer menu items such as the Honey Chilli Chicken burger, Peri Peri Filletz, and various beefburger options. The restaurant chain has received positive reviews for its existing locations.

articles.title: Meghan Markle 'steps back' from selling jam as she reveals when new products will launch
articles.author: Jasmine Carey
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, is planning to announce new products in the first quarter of 2026, potentially expanding beyond its initial offerings of preserves, flower sprinkles, and teas. Meghan intends to focus on the hospitality aspect and gather customer data to inform future product development.

articles.title: Amazon bucket and mop over 1,000 have bought as shopper says 'better'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the JOYMOOP Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set for £31.99, reduced from £39.99 in a limited-time deal. The set features wet and dry separation, a built-in wash squeegee, and a flat mop head.

articles.title: 34 Products From Sephora That Work Like Magic
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: The article highlights several new cosmetic products, including mattifying setting sprays from One/Size, plumping lip treatments from Laneige, body oils from Sol de Janeiro and color correctors from Huda Beauty. It also mentions that Fenty Beauty is launching Homecurl, a gel-cream for curl definition.

articles.title: New Look's £45 midi dress hailed by shoppers for 'making waists look tiny'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: New Look has introduced the Square Neck Midi Dress, retailing at £45.99. The dress features a fit-and-flare profile, a layered bust, and a zip detail on the back, and it's available in red and black. Customer reviews give it 4.7 out of 5 stars for its shape-enhancing design.

articles.title: New Look's £23 'beautiful' holiday dress 'perfect' for summer evenings
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: New Look is offering a 25% discount on select dresses, including the Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress and Black Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, reducing their price to £22.49. The sale is available on select sizes and colors online and potentially in stores.

articles.title: New Look reduces 'beautiful' summer outfit you can 'dress up or down' to £23
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: New Look is offering a 25% discount on dresses, including the Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress and the Black Puff Sleeve Midi Dress. The Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress is discounted from £29.99 to £22.49, while the Blue Puff Sleeve Midi Dress remains at full price. Customers have praised the dresses for their quality and versatility, with some mentioning sizing and material weight concerns.

articles.title: New Look shoppers love £23 red dress that's 'perfect' for summer evenings
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: New Look is offering a 25% discount on select dresses, including the Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress and Black Puff Sleeve Midi Dress. These dresses are described as having a 'sun-ready feel' with features like short puffy sleeves and flattering ruching, and are available in various sizes.

articles.title: Thread by @damienghader on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Lovable is introducing new features for website design using AI prompts. These include the ability to generate sleek onboarding experiences using prompts such as 'Apple-style UI', structured UIs with grid and hierarchy hints, and animations using templates. Lovable allows users to add motion and micro-interactions, like smooth hover transitions, and animate uploaded logos/icons and showcase examples like a Nike concept site.

articles.title: Cream Stone TUBZ gains market momentum through flavour innovation and digital strategy
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Cream Stone launched a new family pack range called TUBZ, featuring flavors like Alphonso Mango and Taati Munjalu. Five flavors including Belgian Brownie Fudge, Ferro Love, Lotus Biscoff, Alphonso Mango, and Raspberry Pannacotta have become customer favorites. The company is leveraging quick commerce to reach customers in 15 cities after the TUBZ launch.

articles.title: Treasury Wine Estates adds Daughters of the Vine sangria RTD
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Treasury Wine Estates (TWE) has launched Daughters of the Vine, a new ready-to-drink sangria brand made with red wine, blood orange, and ginger. The product aims to attract younger consumers to the wine category and is currently available in Sainsbury's stores. Suntory Beverage & Food GB&I (SBF GB&I) also launched La Casera, a Spanish wine-based RTD.

articles.title: Google's Local AI Model for Phones
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google has launched its Local AI Model for phones, bringing powerful AI capabilities directly to smartphones. This on-device AI improves user experience by enhancing speed and enabling offline functionality. Applications include Google Assistant, Google Photos (Magic Eraser), and Google Translate.

articles.title: From Kahi to Yless: How KoreaTech CEO is building next wave of K-beauty
articles.author: 어른들의 국어문제집
articles.summary: KoreaTech launched the Yless platform in December 2023 to spotlight indie K-beauty brands and offer unique, high-quality products at affordable prices. Yless expanded to the US and Japan and focuses on product diversity, including a wide range of foundation shades and dupes of luxury fragrances.

articles.title: 25 Under-$20 Things From Target To Brag About
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduces Holy Hydration! face cream with SPF 30 and hyaluronic acid, priced at $13. Kristen Ess launches a deep conditioning hair treatment for dry or damaged hair, priced at $17.99. Physicians Formula offers a face palette containing bronzers, highlighters, blush, and powder, available for $19.59.

articles.title: 2025 Cadillac Optiq Review: A Surprisingly Fresh and Fun Electric SUV from a Legacy Brand
articles.author: Neal Pollack
articles.summary: Cadillac, GM's luxury division, launched the Optiq, a new baseline electric SUV geared towards younger buyers. The Optiq features synchronized front and rear electric motors generating 300 horsepower and offers over 300 miles of electric driving range. The base price for the Optiq starts at slightly more than $55,000.

articles.title: Steri Stumpie Solves the MySteri with a Fruity New Flavour
articles.author: International
articles.summary: Steri Stumpie has launched its newest flavor, Peachy Litchi, after a month-long marketing campaign called 'MySteri' that included clues, live game shows, and social media engagement. The new flavor is available in stores.

articles.title: New Look shoppers 'immediately fall in love' with 'gorgeous' £23 dress
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: New Look has discounted its popular Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress to £22.49. The retailer is also offering discounts on the Black and Pink versions of the dress. Other similar dresses from competitors are also mentioned such as Next's Bright Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress for £42, Dorothy Perkins's Floral Shirred Bodice Puff Sleeve Midi Dress on sale for £31.20, Nobody's Child's Red Rose Print Nova Midi Smock Dress on sale for £71.20 and Boden's Sofia Trim Jersey Midi Dress for £98.

articles.title: Belfast tech company invests £1.8m in cybersecurity solution for factory floors
articles.author: David Young
articles.summary: A company is introducing a new solution designed for easy deployment on both existing and new manufacturing equipment. This solution aims to expand the company's core offering and facilitate entry into new global markets. The seamless deployment is a key enabler for this expansion.

articles.title: Toyota Fortuner with mild hybrid tech launched: Price, bookings & more
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Toyota has launched mild-hybrid versions of the Fortuner and Legender in India. The Fortuner Neo Drive 48V starts at Rs 44.72 lakh, and the Legender Neo Drive 48V costs Rs 50.09 lakh.  The new versions feature a 48-volt mild-hybrid system for smoother performance and improved fuel efficiency, along with upgrades like a 360-degree camera and wireless smartphone charger.

articles.title: HONOR launches Abu Dhabi's first authorised experience store and service centre, amplifying UAE presence
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: HONOR has launched its first Authorized Experience Store & Service Centre in Abu Dhabi on May 23, 2025. This store features product displays, themed zones for accessories and smartwatches, and an interactive area to explore HONOR's latest innovations. Furthermore, the store will provide service promotions including free screen protectors, laser engraving, cleaning and system upgrades for HONOR phones, as well as promotions on flagship products such as the HONOR Magic V3, HONOR Magic7 Pro, and HONOR MagicPad 2.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launch date, expected price, specifications, features, camera: Here's all you need to know
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new smartphone, the OnePlus 13s, in India on June 5, featuring new AI tools, a customizable Plus Key, and Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Elite processor. The phone includes features such as AI VoiceScribe, AI Translation, AI Search, AI Reframe, and AI Best Face 2.0, and integrates with Google's Gemini AI assistant.

articles.title: Samsung launches AI-powered TV lineup with groundbreaking Vision AI
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 lineup of AI TVs and sound devices, featuring Samsung Vision AI. The new AI TVs include Neo QLED 8K with the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor, QLED TVs with real quantum dot technology, and OLED TVs with a 165Hz refresh rate. Pre-orders are open until June 30, 2025, offering savings and freebies.

articles.title: Bulletproof™ Reintroduces Itself with New Look and Evolved Mission: Coffee That Lifts You Up
articles.author: Bulletproof
articles.summary: Bulletproof has unveiled a rebrand, marking its evolution into a premium coffee brand. The rebrand reflects a focus on making wellness simple, delicious, and accessible. This shift signifies a move from biohacking roots to a modern coffee company.

articles.title: Ruwido opens new revenue streams from remote control
articles.author: Julian Clover
articles.summary: Ruwido has launched a new "addressable promotion service" that transforms the traditional remote control into a communication, promotion, and revenue generation tool. This service features a touch-sensitive LCD button for delivering targeted promotions and real-time AI-driven analytics and enables service providers to generate revenue through various upselling and advertising strategies.

articles.title: New Look £35 denim skirt is 'comfortable' and 'looks great'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: New Look is selling the Blue Denim Tiered Midi Skirt for £34.99. The skirt features a tiered design, midi length, mid-rise waist, side slit pockets, and an elasticated waist. It is made from denim material and is available in blue, with sizes ranging from 16-18.

articles.title: GoodData Unveils AI-Powered Smart Search
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: GoodData launched AI Smart Search, an AI-native feature for its analytics platform, designed to help users quickly find analytics content. The new feature uses semantic understanding and AI to deliver relevant results based on names, descriptions, and tags. GoodData AI Smart Search is designed for flexibility, whether used as a native feature within the GoodData platform or integrated into your own applications via APIs and SDKs.

articles.title: Renault India introduces ‘discovery days' campaign with exclusive offers from June 6
articles.author: ETAuto Desk
articles.summary: Renault India launched Renault Discovery Days from June 6-16, 2025, to showcase innovation and offer compelling deals. The campaign introduces retrofit CNG options across their vehicle range and provides exclusive deals on RXT, RXT+, and RXZ variants, including 0% interest on loans and exchange benefits.

articles.title: SS Innovations to Ring the Nasdaq Opening Bell on Tuesday, June 3, 2025
articles.author: SS Innovations
articles.summary: SS Innovations International, Inc. celebrated the uplisting of its common stock to Nasdaq. This event also commemorated the successful completion of over 4,000 robotic surgeries using the SSi Mantra surgical robotic system across various types of surgeries without complications, injuries, or mortalities. The company aims for global deployment of the SSi Mantra to enable accessible robotic surgery.

articles.title: Ads ruined social media. Now they're coming to AI chatbots.
articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.summary: AI companies such as OpenAI with ChatGPT, Google with Gemini Pro, and Anthropic with Claude, are exploring advertising as a new revenue model for their services. Perplexity has already started integrating sponsored questions.  OpenAI hired Fidji Simo to scale up the company's growth, indicating a potential shift towards an ad-supported model.

articles.title: Brass Knuckles Achieves Strong Retail Traction in Nevada, Expands In-Demand Product Line
articles.summary: Brass Knuckles, a cannabis brand, has relaunched in Nevada with its Crystal Mouthpiece All-In-One (AIO) hardware. Following the relaunch, Brass Knuckles plans to expand its product line to include 510 cartridges, infused pre-rolls, and new strain drops starting this summer.

articles.title: Cream Stone TUBZ Gains Market Momentum Through Flavour Innovation and Digital Strategy
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Cream Stone launched a new family pack range called "TUBZ" with 12 new flavors and introduced Alphonso Mango and Taati Munjalu flavors in stores. They are leveraging quick commerce to reach customers in 15 cities and engaging in community activities to promote brand awareness. The strategic move has accelerated the brand's market penetration.

articles.title: Father's Day gift ideas 2025: Ideas for dads who love golf, gardening and BBQs
articles.author: The LADbible Team
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products and services in time for Father's Day. Molton Brown offers a bath & shower gel, while Rex London presents a BBQ set. Perfume Direct has YSL eau de parfum. Huawei presents the new watch, and Lululemon offers a versatile backpack, Instax presents instant camera, Beats introduces headphones, Ace + Tate showcases sunglasses, Bulldog launches daily moisturiser, Merrell Moab introduces walking shoes, Aromatherapy Associates offers gift set, Footjoy offers golf gloves, and GTech introduces grass edge trimmer.

articles.title: Next's £59 chiffon maxi dress that feels a 'million dollars' and is 'worth every penny'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next introduced the 'Friends Like These Short Sleeve Chiffon Tiered Maxi Dress,' priced at £59 and available in six prints. The polyester dress, featuring flutter sleeves, a crew neckline, a tiered hem, and maxi length, has received positive customer reviews on Next's website.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s Bets on Slim Flagship Trend — Innovation or Imitation?
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13s in India and other regions on June 5, as a rebadged version of the OnePlus 13T. The phone features the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, Sony camera sensors, LTPO AMOLED displays, and fast-charging battery. Expected to be priced around ₹55,000, the OnePlus 13s aims to offer a high-end slim phone alternative, potentially impacting the adoption of sleek phones.

articles.title: Next's €54 summer dress is so perfect shoppers 'wish it came in more colours'
articles.author: Ruairi Scott Byrne
articles.summary: Next has launched the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress, priced at €54 and available online in multiple colors and sizes (6-22). The dress is described as versatile, suitable for both casual and dressy occasions, featuring a flattering neckline, waist details, and side pockets. Customer reviews highlight its comfortable fit, quality fabric, and stylish design.

articles.title: CJ CheilJedang introduces AI-powered search service
articles.author: Spynet
articles.summary: CJ CheilJedang Corp. has launched Fai, a new AI-powered conversational search service on CJ The Market. Fai helps users discover healthy food options by utilizing natural language queries and providing tailored recommendations based on user data. It also supports health-focused comparisons and offers quick access to nutritional information.

articles.title: Papa Johns Canada Introduces Cheddar Crust Pizza, A New Take on a Classic Favourite
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Papa Johns is launching a new product in Canada: the Cheddar Crust Pizza. This pizza features a cheddar cheese and garlic seasoning baked directly onto the fresh dough.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works is now easy to shop in the UK: 10 shockingly good perfume dupes for luxury scents
articles.author: Sam Neibart
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is launching new additions to its Everyday Luxuries collection, offering affordable dupes of popular luxury perfumes. These scents, priced under £20 and often on sale, are targeted towards a broad audience and are gaining traction due to the brand's TikTok presence and recent expansion into the UK market.

articles.title: BT launches new standalone international business division
articles.summary: BT launched BT International, a new division serving multi-national customers. BT International will deliver services using two telco platforms: Global Voice and Global Fabric, both with integrated security.

articles.title: New Land Capital Brings Innovation, Investors, and Ideas Together at SIA Startup Show & Afterparty
articles.summary: New Land Capital hosted the Sustainability in Action (SIA) Startup Show, featuring innovative pitches from startups. UUL Company presented luxury cashmere, SereNova showcased wellness-tech, and Josephine Collection displayed ethical jewelry. These startups competed for awards during the event.

articles.title: Saving Singapore's Wet Markets
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Several wet market vendors in Singapore are adopting new strategies to reach a broader customer base. 'The BeefFellas' are selling chilled Japanese Wagyu beef through online sales and deliveries.  'SanDai Fishball' has developed a significant social media presence to extend its reach beyond its physical location. Al-Masyhur, a halal meat and seafood stall, has increased online sales by hosting live-stream sales three times a week.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' £22 dress in 4 colours can be worn 'on any occasion'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next is offering the Jersey Midi Summer Dress for £22 and Forever Comfort Slot Mule Sandals also for £22. Nobody's Child features the Colorado Midi Dress priced between £60 and £89. Club L London sells the Parina Strappy Volume-Hem Midi Dress for £110.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers hail game-changing portable Ninja blender as 'best little blender ever'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Blast Portable Blender, a compact blender designed for making smoothies and protein shakes on-the-go. The blender features stainless steel blades, a rechargeable USB-C battery, and a leak-proof lid. It is currently available on Amazon, Ninja, and Argos.

articles.title: alcatel V3 Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: alcatel officially announced the alcatel V3 Pro on May 27, 2025. This 5G-ready smartphone features a 5200 mAh battery with 18W wired charging, a Mediatek Dimensity 6300 processor, and a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel wide lens. The phone operates on Android 15 and offers up to 3 major Android upgrades.

articles.title: Meta plans to fully automate making of ads using AI
articles.summary: Meta Platforms plans to allow brands to create and target ads fully through AI by the end of next year. The new AI-powered tools would enable brands to generate entire ads, including images, video, and text, from a product image and budgetary goal, targeting specific users on Facebook and Instagram.

articles.title: Uniphore Introduces Marketing Agents, Providing AI-Powered Automation to Marketers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Uniphore launched Marketing Agents, an AI-powered suite for its CDP, featuring Platform Search Agent (limited availability Summer 2025), Audience Segmentation Agent (limited availability Summer 2025), and Product Knowledge Agent (generally available). The Marketing Agents are designed to accelerate data access and audience segmentation for marketing teams.

articles.title: Uniphore Introduces Marketing Agents, Providing AI-Powered Automation to Marketers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Uniphore unveiled Marketing Agents, a new suite of AI agents. These agents are designed to accelerate how marketing teams access data, segment audiences and work inside the Uniphore Customer Data Platform (CDP). The CDP serves as the foundational layer to Uniphore's larger Enterprise AI platform.

articles.title: Elon Musk unveils XChat to rival WhatsApp, Telegram, others globally
articles.author: Nairametrics
articles.summary: Elon Musk's company X (formerly Twitter) launched XChat, a new messaging feature. XChat aims to compete with existing messaging applications like WhatsApp, Telegram, and Signal.

articles.title: Samsung's new Galaxy S25 looks sensational but buying it comes with a warning
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, a 6.7-inch screen, dual-lens camera, and Galaxy AI. A battery drain test revealed that the S25 Edge lasted for 7 hours and 57 seconds.

articles.title: Algolia Redefines Online Fashion Retail with the Next Generation of Its Intelligent Fashion Solution
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Algolia has launched a new version of its Intelligent Fashion Solution, featuring Real-Time Personalization, AI Ranking, Smart Groups, Collections, and Generative AI Shopping Guides. These innovations aim to provide personalized and curated online shopping experiences for fashion consumers, improving conversions and shopper engagement for retailers.

articles.title: The Invisible Hand of AI -- How Generative Models Shape Our Daily Decisions
articles.summary: Generative AI is now integrated into several products and services. Gmail helps draft emails, PowerPoint creates presentations, Microsoft Word fixes sentences. Canva and Adobe offer design ideas. Khan Academy and Duolingo have AI tutors to make learning easier and fun.

articles.title: Next selling £32 'Italy-inspired' dress that's similar to £1,700 version
articles.author: Sam Dimmer
articles.summary: Next is offering a new cream, pink, and blue house print scoop back mini shift dress for £32, crafted from a lightweight linen blend. The dress, available in multiple sizes, features a scoop back neckline, side pockets, and a split side hem. Customer reviews are mixed, with some praising its look and comfort, while others find the colors drab or the fit unflattering.

articles.title: Next's £32 'Italy-inspired' summer dress that's similar to £1,700 Dolce & Gabbana version
articles.author: Sam Dimmer
articles.summary: Next is offering a cream, pink, and blue house print scoop back mini shift dress for £32, featuring a design similar to Dolce & Gabbana. Boden is offering the Alexa maxi shirt dress at a discounted price of £94.50, down from £126.

articles.title: Police warn of critical infrastructure vulnerabilities after detecting 440K cyber threats in 2024
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: WhatsApp released a new ad featuring gibberish texts. This ad serves as promotion of its service.

articles.title: 50 Mundane Products That Are, To Put It Lightly, Life Changing
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Built introduced "Puff Protein Bars", chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Medicube launched "Zero Pore" Pads, a Korean skincare product. Monday Haircare released Dry Shampoo with gardenia scent and keratin treatment.

articles.title: Toyota Fortuner and Legender mild-hybrid variants make India entry, starting at Rs 44.72 lakh
articles.summary: Toyota has launched Neo Hybrid variants of the Fortuner and Legender SUVs in India. These variants feature a 48V hybrid system and a 360-degree camera, with bookings open and deliveries expected in June. The Fortuner Neo Hybrid is priced at Rs 44.72 lakh, and the Legender Neo Hybrid retails at Rs 50.09 lakh (both ex-showroom).

articles.title: E& launches Galaxy S25 Edge with premium data bundle
articles.summary: E& UAE has launched the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge in the UAE, making it available through official sales channels. E& UAE is the exclusive distributor of this new device.

articles.title: FEATURED: Masaka Farms launches eggless mayonnaise with lemon, cocktail flavor
articles.author: Jessica Agasaro
articles.summary: Masaka Farms launched its new line of eggless mayonnaise in Kigali, featuring lemon and cocktail flavors. The eggless mayonnaise caters to consumer preferences and is available in major supermarkets across Kigali, retailing between Rwf3,200 and Rwf3,500.

articles.title: Aldi launches £6.99 Burberry and Givenchy fragrance dupes that make perfect Father's Day presents & save you £130
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new fragrance dupes of Burberry Hero and Givenchy Gentleman under the Lacura Men's Eau De Parfum line, priced at £6.99 each, offering budget-friendly alternatives for Father's Day gifts. Aldi also released  Beer Dispenser and Drew & Cole Sandwich Maker.

articles.title: Aldi launches £6.99 Burberry and Givenchy fragrance dupes that make perfect Father's Day presents & save you £130
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: ALDI has launched new fragrance dupes, including Island Oasis, Ambition and Iconic Man, priced at £6.99, comparable to Burberry Hero and Givenchy Gentleman. ALDI also launched £24.99 Beer Dispenser that transforms ordinary canned beer into a draught experience.

articles.title: This incredible £105 Talisker whisky has just plummeted in price
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of Talisker's 2022 special release 11-year-old single malt whisky to £52. Sky Mobile is offering a free Galaxy Tab A9+ worth £259 with the purchase of a Samsung Galaxy S25 5G phone.

articles.title: Glovo delivered 71 billion worth of food in four years
articles.author: Techpoint
articles.summary: Glovo delivered 71 billion worth of food in four years. X (formerly Twitter) introduced a new way to send DMs.

articles.title: Best Whirlpool washing machines: Top 10 models from semi automatic to fully automatic
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Whirlpool introduces several washing machine models, including fully automatic and semi-automatic options, targeting different family sizes. Notable models include the Whirlpool 7 kg Magic Clean 5 Star, Whirlpool 7.5 Kg 5 Star StainWash Royal Plus, and Whirlpool 9 Kg 5 Star Bloomwash Pro, each boasting unique features such as TurboDry technology, in-built heaters, and multiple wash programs to enhance cleaning efficiency and convenience.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launching on 5 June in India: Expected price, specs, and all you need to kow
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new compact flagship, OnePlus 13s, in India on June 5, featuring new OnePlus AI features and the Plus Key. The phone will be powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and is likely to be a rebranded version of the OnePlus 13T. OnePlus 13s will come with a new suite of AI features, including AI VoiceScribe, AI Translation, AI Search, AI Reframe and AI Best Face 2.0.

articles.title: Morning Duck LLC Announces the Launch of Morning Duck Coffee
articles.author: Praveen
articles.summary: Morning Duck, LLC is launching Morning Duck Coffee, a single-origin Colombian coffee brand, on June 20, 2025. Available exclusively online, the coffee comes in dark and medium roasts, whole bean and ground formats, sourced from 100% single-origin Arabica beans.

articles.title: bolttech powers Generative AI-driven hyper-personalized customer services on AWS
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: bolttech has launched "bolttech Gen AI Factory," a new Gen AI platform built on Amazon Bedrock, to enhance customer service and operational efficiency. This platform provides real-time personalized responses to customer inquiries and automates routine tasks like claims processing.  It also enables internal teams to develop and deploy Gen AI applications across the insurance value chain.

articles.title: The G-Class was turned into... an off-road minivan
articles.author: Radoslav Slavchev
articles.summary: An independent designer created a concept rendering of the Mercedes-Benz G-Class called GVagen, transforming the off-road vehicle into an off-road minivan. The GVagen concept features a spacious interior and is designed for long off-road trips. This concept explores a niche market in campers and expedition vans, but no official plans for production have been announced.

articles.title: "What Part Of Germany Is This?" Internet Reacts To Viral Video Of Robot Guide In Grocery Store
articles.author: Neha Grover
articles.summary: A German grocery store is piloting a robot guide service.  The robot assists customers by navigating them to the specific aisles where requested grocery items are located. Customers select an item on the robot's display screen, and the robot then guides them to the relevant section of the store.

articles.title: Grindr rolls out new in-app, live feed ‘Right Now' with disappearing posts
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Grindr has launched a new social media-like live feed feature called 'Right Now' globally. Grindr also introduced AI features A-List, which shows summaries of chats, and Wingman, an AI assistant, to help users with responses, dating spots and sex tips. These new features and their AI integration are aimed at improving the user experience and connections on the platform.

articles.title: Unilever gearing up for a liquid detergent boom
articles.author: Md Nurul Monowar
articles.summary: Unilever Bangladesh is launching local production of Surf Excel Liquid to make it more affordable and widely available. They have also introduced Rin Liquid as a more affordable option and are investing in education campaigns to promote the benefits of liquid detergents over powder detergents, especially with the increasing adoption of washing machines.

articles.title: Eastern Cape Entrepreneur Empowers Youth Through Detergent Manufacturing Business
articles.summary: Ncebakazi Mbogo, an entrepreneur, runs a detergent manufacturing business producing cleaning products. She aims to expand her business and distribute her products in retail stores across Africa. She also trains and employs young people from her community to help them learn manufacturing skills.

articles.title: Papa Johns Canada Introduces Cheddar Crust Pizza, A New Take on a Classic Favourite
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Papa Johns is launching a new Cheddar Crust Pizza and Cheddar Cheesesticks across Canada starting June 2nd. The Cheddar Crust Pizza features a cheddar cheese and garlic seasoning baked onto the crust and will be available for $17.99, while the Cheddar Cheesesticks are baked with a cheddar twist and served with pizza sauce.

articles.title: Why new brands are betting big on Tamil Nadu: GCPL's Sudhir Sitapati explains
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products (GCPL) launched two new brands, Ninja (pet food) and Bloq (anti-perspirant), in Tamil Nadu. This strategy follows previous rollouts of GCPL's Fab liquid detergent and Cinthol Bodywash in the same region. Tamil Nadu offers favorable conditions due to its economic profile, media efficiency, and accessible retail infrastructure.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Pro Sale Begins Today in India, Smartphone Offers 6.67-inch 120Hz Display; Check Price, Other Specifications and Features Here
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles launched the Lava Bold N1 Pro smartphone in India on June 2, 2025, featuring a Unisoc T606 processor, 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, 50MP primary camera, and 128GB storage with 4GB RAM. The phone is available on Amazon and priced at INR 6,999, with a special launch price of INR 6,699.

articles.title: 29 Products That'll Bring So Much Joy For So Little Money
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced a shea butter–infused cream-to-powder multistick, designed as a blush, lipstick, and eyeshadow replacement. Orly launched Bonder base coat that keeps your polish fresh for longer. Flip It! launched a bottle emptying kit that turns pump bottles into squeeze jars.

articles.title: Nykaa shares in focus after reporting 193% YoY surge in Q4 PAT
articles.author: Nishtha Awasthi
articles.summary: Nykaa expanded its beauty portfolio by launching global beauty brands, including Yves Saint Laurent, NARS, Kerastase, Armani Beauty, and Supergoop. The 'House of Nykaa' brands nearly doubled sales over the last two years, generating a GMV of Rs 1,700 crore in FY25.

articles.title: How Australia can fight the coming AI apocalypse
articles.author: Jordan Guiao
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new 'AI mode' and expanded 'AI overviews'. These AI-powered features will replace the traditional keyword-based search with a more conversational question-answering system and recommendations.

articles.title: Creativity, consumer insight reshaping male grooming sector
articles.summary: Team Dr Adonis from the Chinese University of Hong Kong (Shenzhen) has developed Darklion, a smart home hair dyeing solution using AI for precise application and anti-hair loss care. REVIX from Shanghai New York University created a device with NFC chip technology to track real-time changes in dark circles and puffiness, catering to men's desire for fast-acting skincare results.

articles.title: Awarding innovation, welcoming the future
articles.author: jimjin
articles.summary: LygometryX AI launched in 2024 by Gitansh Khirbat and Sneha Sant, offers low and no-code AI infrastructure to small and medium retailers to maximize conversion rates, monitor competitors, and determine optimal retail prices. This service helps local businesses increase their profits by addressing challenges such as lost conversions, razor-thin margins, messy data, and lack of AI expertise.

articles.title: San Jose's Hunt for Blue Line Talent INTENSIFIES
articles.summary: WeAreIowa app is available for streaming WeAreIowa content on your phone.

articles.title: Nissan launches new, mid-size PHEV pickup that undercuts $20K Slate *
articles.author: Jo Borrás
articles.summary: Zhengzhou Nissan has launched the Z9, a new plug-in pickup truck in the Chinese market. The Z9 offers over 35 miles of all-electric range with a base 17 kWh battery, and an extended-range model with a 32.85 kWh battery provides almost 85 miles of range. Nissan aims for global expansion with its newest electrified pickup, supporting ZNA's 'off-road strategy'.

articles.title: 42 Products You'll Be Tempted To Add To Your Cart
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: BuzzFeed's Goodful line introduced a colorful pan capable of various cooking methods. Subtl Beauty launched a 5-in-1 starter stack containing concealer, highlighter, bronzer, lip and cheek balm, and shine control powder.

articles.title: UK-listed IG Group launches crypto trading to retail investors
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: IG is expanding its cryptocurrency offering with a new launch. The company previously offered crypto-based contracts for difference.

articles.title: 5 Google I/O 2025 AI features you can try now in India right away
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google introduced new AI-focused features across its product line at I/O 2025. These updates provide new tools and services for developers, businesses, and everyday users. Five key features are now available or coming soon in India.

articles.title: Elon Musk's XChat Launches with 'Bitcoin-Style' Security, Experts Disagree
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: X, Elon Musk's social platform, launched XChat, a new messaging feature.

articles.title: Vintage Coffee subsidiary launches liquid coffee product line
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Vintage Coffee launched a new liquid coffee product.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 last-minute pre-orders as console launches this week for UK gamers
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch its newest console, the Switch 2, on June 5. Shoppers will be able to purchase the new console.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 consoles back in stock for pre-orders at major online retailer ahead of ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5th.

articles.title: WinGD enters the engine aftercare market with Global Service launch
articles.author: system
articles.summary: WinGD, a Swiss marine power company, has launched its global service offer. This expands the company's provision of original parts supply, in-service support, and technical expertise.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Game Upgrade Pack Prices Revealed Ahead of Debut
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Nintendo is scheduled to launch the Nintendo Switch 2 later this week. The company has also revealed pricing for Nintendo Switch 2 Upgrade Packs across various regions, enabling game owners to access Switch.

articles.title: HONOR launches Abu Dhabi's first authorised experience store and service centre, amplifying UAE presence
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: HONOR is expanding its presence in the UAE with the launch of its first authorized experience store and service center in Abu Dhabi. The opening marks a significant step in HONOR's strategic expansion within the region.

articles.title: How Innovation Will Create The Warehouses Of The Future
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LuminX, a startup, is unveiling its seed round. It plans to drive new efficiencies in supply chains, implying the development or introduction of related services.

articles.title: Forget the Switch 2 – I've just tried the Lenovo Legion Go S and now ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Lenovo Legion Go S, the first third-party SteamOS handheld, has been launched.

articles.title: Toyota Kirloskar Motor launches Fortuner and Legender Neo Drive 48V variants
articles.author: Ranojoy Mukerji
articles.summary: Toyota Kirloskar Motor has introduced new 'Neo Drive' variants of the Fortuner and Legender, equipped with a 48-Volt system. These variants feature improved fuel efficiency, enhanced driving performance, and greater comfort. The Neo Drive variants aim to offer better fuel economy and lower emissions through integration with Toyota's 2.8-litre engine.
